data.comment: The match is underway at BC Place.
Vancouver awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 2, Montreal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Montreal in the half of Vancouver.
Montreal have been awarded a corner by Pierre-Luc Lauziere.
In the minute 4, Pierre-Luc Lauziere signals a Montreal throw-in in Vancouver's half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Montreal's Jukka Raitala is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 6, Can Montreal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vancouver's half?
Montreal to take a throw-in in Vancouver territory.
Theo Bair is on target to give Vancouver a 1-0 advantage.
In the minute 7, That's a fine assist from David Milinkovic.
Vancouver have a goal kick.
Leonard Owusu is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Montreal in the half of Vancouver.
Ball safe as Montreal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Vancouver in their own half.
In the minute 12, Vancouver's Leonard Owusu is back in action after a slight knock.
Pierre-Luc Lauziere awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in Montreal.
In the minute 13, David Milinkovic of Vancouver smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Vancouver.
Vancouver have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 15, Throw-in for Vancouver at BC Place.
Goal! Orji Okwonkwo levels the match at 1-1.
Saphir Taider instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 17, Pierre-Luc Lauziere signals a Montreal throw-in in Vancouver's half.
Pierre-Luc Lauziere signals a free kick to Vancouver in their own half.
In Vancouver a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 19, Important block from the Montreal defence as Andy Rose fires in a strike for Vancouver.
Montreal drives forward and Orji Okwonkwo gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Free kick for Vancouver in their own half.
In the minute 22, Montreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Pierre-Luc Lauziere signals a free kick to Montreal in their own half.
At BC Place, Lucas Cavallini has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 27, Free kick for Vancouver in their own half.
Vancouver needs to be cautious. Montreal have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Vancouver in their own half.
In the minute 28, Vancouver awarded a free kick in their own half.
Vancouver pushes forward through Lucas Cavallini, whose finish on goal is saved.
Vancouver have been awarded a corner by Pierre-Luc Lauziere.
In the minute 33, Pierre-Luc Lauziere awards the home team a throw-in.
Vancouver to take a throw-in in Montreal territory.
Throw-in Montreal.
In the minute 35, Pierre-Luc Lauziere signals a free kick to Montreal in their own half.
Vancouver awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Vancouver awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 37, Goal kick for Vancouver at BC Place.
Pierre-Luc Lauziere signals a free kick to Montreal in their own half.
Montreal drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 41, In Vancouver, Saphir Taider of Montreal is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Victor Wanyama gets his shot on target but fails to score for Montreal.
Corner awarded to Montreal.
In the minute 43, Theo Bair's header is off-target for Vancouver.
Pierre-Luc Lauziere awards Montreal a goal kick.
Montreal have been awarded a penalty...
The 1st half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Free kick for Vancouver in their own half.
In the minute 45, Montreal's Romell Quioto gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Vancouver.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 45, Goal! Saphir Taider gives Montreal a 1-2 lead from the penalty spot.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway in Vancouver.
Free kick for Vancouver in their own half.
The match at BC Place has been interrupted briefly for a check on Thomas Hasal, who is down injured.
In the minute 48, Thomas Hasal returns to the field for Vancouver after picking up a slight injury.
Throw-in for Vancouver in their own half.
Throw-in for Montreal in the half of Vancouver.
In the minute 49, Can Vancouver get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Montreal's half?
Free kick Vancouver.
Vancouver surge into the attack at BC Place but Lucas Cavalliniâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 51, Ball goes out of play for a Montreal goal kick.
Great finish from Samuel Piette to give Montreal a 1-3 lead.
Saphir Taider with an assist there.
In the minute 54, Vancouver have a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Vancouver.
Marc Dos Santos (Vancouver) is making a first substitution, with Jake Nerwinski replacing Erik Godoy.
In the minute 55, Marc Dos Santos is making the team's second substitution at BC Place with Cristian Dajome replacing Leonard Owusu.
Cristian Gutierrez is on a sub for Ali Adnan for Vancouver.
Montreal have been awarded a corner by Pierre-Luc Lauziere.
In the minute 57, Pierre-Luc Lauziere signals a free kick to Montreal in their own half.
Lucas Cavallini in Vancouver has been yellow-carded a second time by Pierre-Luc Lauziere and is being sent off.
Montreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
The home team have replaced Theo Bair with Fredy Montero. This is the fourth substitution made today by Marc Dos Santos.
In the minute 59, Luis Binks is booked for the away team.
Romell Quioto puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 1-4.
In the minute 60, Great play from Samuel Piette to set up the goal.
Ball safe as Vancouver is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Vancouver at BC Place.
In the minute 62, Throw-in high up the field for Vancouver in Vancouver.
Vancouver's Cristian Dajome gets in a shot on goal at BC Place. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Vancouver.
In the minute 63, In Vancouver Vancouver drive forward through Derek Cornelius. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Vancouver will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Montreal.
In the minute 66, Vancouver have been awarded a corner by Pierre-Luc Lauziere.
Pierre-Luc Lauziere signals a throw-in for Vancouver, close to Montreal's area.
Rudy Camacho blunders with an own goal. This makes it 2-4.
Pierre-Luc Lauziere signals a free kick to Montreal.
In the minute 69, Pierre-Luc Lauziere signals a free kick to Montreal.
Vancouver's Cristian Dajome has been booked in Vancouver.
In Vancouver Montreal attack through Romell Quioto. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 70, Goal kick for Vancouver at BC Place.
Pierre-Luc Lauziere signals a free kick to Vancouver in their own half.
Vancouver awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 72, Maciel (Montreal) is red-carded and dismissed.
Corner awarded to Vancouver.
In the minute 74, Pierre-Luc Lauziere signals a free kick to Montreal just outside Vancouver's area.
The home team replace David Milinkovic with Yordy Reyna.
Michael Baldisimo (Vancouver) has received a first yellow card.
Montreal push forward at BC Place and Saphir Taider gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Vancouver defence.
In the minute 76, Montreal's Jukka Raitala breaks free at BC Place. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Vancouver goal kick.
Ball safe as Montreal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 78, Free kick Vancouver.
Throw-in for Vancouver in their own half.
Throw-in for Montreal close to the penalty box.
In the minute 80, Montreal are in shooting range from this free kick.
Corner awarded to Montreal.
Free kick for Vancouver in their own half.
In the minute 83, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Vancouver a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Montreal in the half of Vancouver.
In the minute 86, Lassi Lappalainen is replacing Romell Quioto for the away team.
Pierre-Luc Lauziere awards Vancouver a goal kick.
Vancouver's Russell Teibert gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Montreal defender.
In the minute 89, Vancouver have been awarded a corner by Pierre-Luc Lauziere.
Derek Cornelius (Vancouver) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Vancouver.
In Vancouver a free kick has been awarded the home team.
7 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Can Vancouver capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Montreal's half?
Vancouver are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Free kick for Montreal in the half of Vancouver.
Free kick Vancouver.
Free kick for Montreal in their own half.
Fredy Montero for Vancouver gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Montreal have a goal kick.
Pierre-Luc Lauziere awards Montreal a goal kick.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-4.
Montreal make their second substitution with Shamit Shome replacing Orji Okwonkwo.
Fredy Montero (Vancouver) gets a yellow card.
